pages.text: This mod adds two mobs. $(br2)The looting of mob are important crafting ingredient.$(br2)The chance of spawn hostile creatures in this mod can be modified in the configuration file. When set to 0, these monsters can be prohibited from spawn.
Spawn in the plain biome at night, it will fly and simultaneously shoot danmaku to attack players and maids.
Spawn in the forest biome at night, it will attack players and maids.
